svg.content:
<mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/26.0.9 Chrome/128.0.6613.186 Electron/32.2.5 Safari/537.36" scale="1" border="0" version="26.0.9"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="V5gVmRUjyAwF4OXgqutM"> <mxGraphModel dx="2271" dy="1013" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0" adaptiveColors="none"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-1" value="<b>You</b>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=12;glass=0;strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;fillColor=#BFBFBF;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-666" y="80" width="100" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-2" value="<b>ClearBank</b>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=12;glass=0;strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;fillColor=#BFBFBF;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-346" y="80" width="100" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-3" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="1" target="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-616" y="440" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-366" y="190" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-4" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="1" target="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-296" y="400" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-276" y="150" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-5" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-616" y="160" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-296" y="160" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-6" value="<b>POST&nbsp;/open-banking/vop/v1/payees/single</b><div>using intended payee's details</div>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-5" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="0.0198" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-7" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-296" y="335" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-616" y="335" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-8" value="<b>Response: 200 OK</b>&nbsp;<br>Payee verification response:<br>MTCH, CMTC, NMTC, or NOAP" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-7" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="0.0198" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-19" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-616" y="410" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-616" y="370" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="-656" y="410" /> <mxPoint x="-656" y="370" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-20" value="You display the VoP result to the user who decides whether to proceed with the payment" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=right;labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-776" y="349.99999999999994" width="110" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MlHaTHCSg4MtQRnezN0b-1" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="1" target="D87-py1C0NNabiot2zGQ-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-296" y="440" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-296" y="120" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MlHaTHCSg4MtQRnezN0b-2" value="<b>Responding</b><div><b>PSP</b></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=12;glass=0;strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;fillColor=#BFBFBF;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-40" y="80" width="100" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MlHaTHCSg4MtQRnezN0b-3" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="1" target="MlHaTHCSg4MtQRnezN0b-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="10" y="440" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="10" y="120" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MlHaTHCSg4MtQRnezN0b-4" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-296" y="210" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="10" y="210" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MlHaTHCSg4MtQRnezN0b-5" value="ClearBank uses the 
provided payee account details 
to conduct a VoP check with 
the responding PSP" style="edgeLabel;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="MlHaTHCSg4MtQRnezN0b-4" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="0.0198" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MlHaTHCSg4MtQRnezN0b-6" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;labelBackgroundColor=default;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-296" y="283" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="10" y="283" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MlHaTHCSg4MtQRnezN0b-7" value="Responding PSP provides
the result of the Vop check" style="edgeLabel;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="MlHaTHCSg4MtQRnezN0b-6" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="0.0198" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(191, 191, 191), rgb(73, 73, 73)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 111px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(191, 191, 191), rgb(73, 73, 73)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 431px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 83px; margin-left: 325px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 254px; margin-left: 317px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Response: 200 OK
Payee verification response:
MTCH, CMTC, NMTC, or NOAP

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 277px; margin-left: 0px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: right; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: You display the VoP result to the user who decides whether to proceed with the payment

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(191, 191, 191), rgb(73, 73, 73)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 737px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

g.text: to conduct a VoP check with

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

g.text: the result of the Vop check

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
